titles: The Persecution of them people they call Quakers in several places in Lanchashire
author: Holme, Thomas, d. 1695.
Fell, Leonard, 1624-1700 or 1701.
Addamson, William, 17th cent.
notes: Written by Leonard Fell, Thomas Holme and other Friends. Wing attributes authorship to William Addamson.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
